title: Wendell Potter: US Healthcare Strangled by Massive Insurance Profits and Money in Politics
itunes:title: Wendell Potter: US Healthcare Strangled by Massive Insurance Profits and Money in Politics
description: Former health insurance executive turned whistleblower and investigative journalist Wendell Potter discusses the many ways in which the private health insurance system of the US is not serving anyone well except the insurance companies' owners
content:encoded: Former health insurance executive turned whistleblower and investigative journalist Wendell Potter discusses the many ways in which the private health insurance system of the US is not serving anyone well except the insurance companies' owners
